textBox.richText: Okay, just got this thing working very nicely on my Motorola Backflip (OS 2.1--yep, I upgraded from 1.5; well worth it). This little thingy was fun! Took me only eight hours to make it work flawlessly. I spent another day adding a few minor features (like the option to have sound or vibrations) and testing. Oh yeah, it should work well into the 22nd century, counting the seconds all the way. And yeah, it uses NO processor time when running in the background! Isn’t that neat? It’s available NOW on the marketplace. Want to skip the marketplace? then download the apk directly by right-clicking on the icon above and choose “save-link-as”. Be the first on your block to have this nice and simple app that...keeps track of elapsed time! Weeeee!
